CustomField.description: Defines the maximum number of fields from the SearchResourcesResultFields field set to be displayed in a single row within a search result on the Search Resources page. The default value of 6 is used if the value is null or zero.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Defines the maximum number of fields from the SearchResourcesResultFields field set to be displayed in a single row within a search result on the Search Resources page. The default value of 6 is used if the value is null or zero.
CustomField.label: Max Columns Allowed in Result Section
